title: Clarity Assessment
subtitle: Discover your clarity score and get your free 7-Day Clarity Sprint guide

questions.q1: How clear are you about your career goals for the next 2-3 years?
questions.q2: How confident do you feel making important career decisions?
questions.q3: How satisfied are you with your work-life balance?
questions.q4: How effectively do you handle professional challenges and setbacks?
questions.q5: How aligned is your current role with your values and strengths?
questions.q6: How often do you take strategic actions toward your long-term goals?
questions.q7: How confident are you in your ability to negotiate for what you deserve?
questions.q8: How well do you manage stress and avoid burnout?
questions.q9: How clear are you about your unique professional value proposition?
questions.q10: How satisfied are you with your professional growth rate?

results.low: You're experiencing significant uncertainty in your career path. The good news? Small shifts can create massive clarity.
results.medium: You have some direction but could benefit from more strategic clarity and confidence in your decisions.
results.high: You have strong clarity! Now it's about optimizing and accelerating your growth trajectory.
